abilities.name: Happy Healing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), choose 1 of your Benched Pokémon and flip a coin. If heads, count the number of Energy attached to Blissey and then remove that many damage counters from the chosen Benched Pokémon. This power can't be used if Blissey is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Smash Bomber
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
